title: Renegade Mitt
features: Shell: 100% Polyester, Insulation: 100% Polyester, Lining: 100% Polyester, Palm: Goat Skin Leather
Hand or Machine Wash Gentle Cycle Cold, Tumble Dry Low, Do Not Bleach, Do Not Dry Clean
Mapped Platinum Thinsulate Insulation with 200 Grams on Top and 150 Grams on the Palm
Goat Skin Palm and Thumb Reinforcement, Padded Knuckle Protection, Flat Refcective Elements
Extra-long Cuff with Wrist Cinch and Draw Cord Wind Skirt
description: IceArmor by Clam  was the original ice fishing outerwear company and continues to lead in this category.  Year after year we provide high quality, durable, long lasting gear that enables anglers to battle the toughest winter elements mother nature has to offer.  The Renegade mitt does just that but adds goat skin leather to the long list of features.

title: KEEP YOUR HANDS SUPER WARM Ice Armor mittens
